results.deck: Nearly two thousand years since his last act of combat, Bill Rizer returns to deal with the new "Neo Contra" threat in this 3D top-down shooter for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Neo Contra

results.deck: TimeSplitters is back! Featuring more insane challenges, an updated story mode and 300% more monkey.
results.name: TimeSplitters: Future Perfect

results.deck: A comedic parody of RPG games, The Bard's Tale picks on the original Bard's Tale and Baldur's Gate considerably.  The ragamuffin Bard was voiced by veteran actor Cary Elwes.
results.name: The Bard's Tale

results.deck: Use Joe and Silvia's Viewtiful powers to save Movieland from the accursed Gedow!
results.name: Viewtiful Joe 2

results.deck: The King of Fighters '96 is the third installment of the King of Fighters series, featuring new gameplay mechanics, changes in the roster, and a new story involving Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, and the power of the demon Orochi.
results.name: The King of Fighters '96

results.deck: Monsters are back to brawl again in the sequel that takes place two years after Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee.
results.name: Godzilla: Save the Earth

results.deck: Starsky & Hutch is a driving and shooting game based upon the legendary television show of the 1970's.
results.name: Starsky & Hutch

results.deck: The first in a series of action/adventure games that allowed for multiple, diverting story paths and endings. Swordplay is the primary focus, but, ultimately, the gameplay focuses on the choices made mostly through action and some speech options. Its brevity has been both lauded and criticized.
results.name: Way of the Samurai

results.deck: Anniversary is a remake of the original Tomb Raider game, running in the engine from Tomb Raider: Legend. Join Lara Croft as she travels the world on her very first adventure all over again!
results.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Anniversary

results.deck: A motorcycle racing game released on the PC and PS2 exclusively in PAL regions.
results.name: Super-bikes Riding Challenge

results.deck: The first Commandos game to implement the famous 2D gameplay in a 3D setting. Fight the Axis in several Theaters of War using three different characters, The Beret, The Sniper and The Spy.
results.name: Commandos: Strike Force

results.deck: The King of Route 66 is the sequel to Sega's 18 Wheeler: American Pro Trucker.
results.name: The King of Route 66

results.deck: Empire Interactive and the Origins of Ejay
results.name: eJay ClubWorld

results.deck: A game based on Marvel's superhero and on the first movie of the Spider-Man franchise. It also featured many villains that did not appear in the movie.
results.name: Spider-Man: The Movie

results.deck: Described as "Gun Porn" by its creators, Black is an explosion-filled first-person shooter from Criterion, the development house responsible for the Burnout series, which focuses on destructible environments.
results.name: Black

results.deck: Harry's second year at Hogwarts is marked with whispers about his parentage, snakes, and strange spells causing students to nearly be killed.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

results.deck: This is EA sports yearly release of NBA simulation. Kevin Garnett graces the cover.
results.name: NBA Live 2001

results.deck: Play through the events of the controversial novel in this game that was timed with the release of the movie.
results.name: The Da Vinci Code

results.deck: Resident Evil: Code: Veronica is a survival horror video game initially developed and published by Capcom for the SEGA Dreamcast. It was later released for Sony PlayStation 2 and GameCube with improved graphics.
results.name: Resident Evil: Code: Veronica

results.deck: Spyro the Dragon's fourth adventure, the first home console entry in series not developed by Insomniac Games and first game of the PS2/Gamecube/Xbox era.
results.name: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly

results.deck: The Man of Steel has his hands full as he battles the combined forces of Lex Luthor, Darkseid, and their robot army in this superhero action game.
results.name: Superman: Shadow of Apokolips

results.deck: NASCAR 06 takes some risky steps in the series, implementing total team control, allowing you to swap cars and give out commands like hold position, block, and more!
results.name: NASCAR 06: Total Team Control

results.deck: Red Dead Revolver is a third-person shooter telling the classic tale of revenge in the 1880s American Wild West.
results.name: Red Dead Revolver

results.deck: Burnout Dominator is a Burnout title with a strong emphasis on boost chaining. It is possible to boost nonstop so long as the player continues to drive recklessly while boosting.
results.name: Burnout Dominator

results.deck: Shrek Smash N' Crash Racing is a racing game for multiple platforms featuring characters and settings from the Shrek franchise.
results.name: Shrek Smash N' Crash Racing

results.deck: A golfing simulation with real life courses, golfers, and equipment.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08

results.deck: Crimson Sea 2 is the Playstation 2 sequel to the the original Xbox game Crimson Sea. Once again you reprise the role of Sho, facing off against a new alien menace.
results.name: Crimson Sea 2

results.deck: Capcom's final entry with their collaboration with SNK, completely revamping both the "Ratio" team building system (by removing character-specific strength ratings) and the "Groove" gameplay style system (by adding new Grooves and Groove-specific fighting mechanics).
results.name: Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium

results.deck: SVC Chaos pits SNK's fighters versus Capcom's on SNK's home turf: the Neo Geo.
results.name: SVC Chaos: SNK vs. Capcom

results.deck: Guilty Gear X2 continues the saga of Guilty Gear, bringing a great emphasis on story and character development.
results.name: Guilty Gear X2

results.deck: Lara travels across the world in search of a legendary artifact. The game is considered a restart for the series after the poor reception for Angel of Darkness. It is also the first Tomb Raider game developed by Crystal Dynamics after they took over the role from Core Design.
results.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Legend

results.deck: A warrior for the Union named Caim and the dragon Angelus form a pact, bonding their lives together so that they may fight their mutual enemy the Empire.
results.name: Drakengard

results.deck: To Kill One You Must Become One.
results.name: Terminator 3: The Redemption

results.deck: The third and final episode of this Bandai Namco Japanese RPG series, released in 2006 for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Xenosaga: Episode III - Also Sprach Zarathustra

results.deck: Hummer Badlands is an obscure budget-racing game for the Xbox and Playstation 2 consoles.
results.name: Hummer: Badlands

results.deck: Steel Lancer Arena International or S.L.A.I. is the Playstation 2 based sequel to the Xbox's mech combat simulator "Phantom Crash".
results.name: S.L.A.I.

results.deck: The third entry in the venerable series ventures to a new city, a new console, and a new dimension.
results.name: Sakura Taisen 3: Pari wa Moete iru ka?

results.deck: Resident Evil: Dead Aim is the fourth game in the Gun Survivor series. It features a unique control scheme with exploration performed in the third person perspective while combat takes place in first person.
results.name: Resident Evil: Dead Aim
Speed Challenge: Jacques Villeneuve's Racing Vision

results.deck: The Sopranos: Road to Respect puts players in the shoes of wannabe mobster Joey LaRoccas as you "wack" your way to becoming a made man in the New Jersey crime family the Sopranos.
results.name: The Sopranos: Road to Respect

results.deck: They are the tip of the spear. They strike... swiftly, silently, and invisibly. They call themselves... "The Ghosts."
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon

results.deck: A 3D fighter based on the Dragon Ball Z universe, featuring over 100 characters.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2

results.deck: One of the Dancing Stage series of games (the European version of Dance Dance Revolution). Part of the family-oriented Bemani series.
results.name: Dancing Stage Fever

results.deck: Madden's first release on the PS2 system.
results.name: Madden NFL 2001

results.deck: Underworld: The Eternal War is an action game released on the PS2, which takes place in the same world established in the films.
results.name: Underworld: The Eternal War

results.deck: Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters was a PSP iteration in the series released in 2007, and the game was later ported to the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters

results.deck: Carefully plan out your missions for your squad the Midnight Fenrir to successfully fight for your independence from the Earth Federation.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front

results.deck: The successor to Need for Speed: Most Wanted brought a continued storyline and new race types, but now with a lesser focus on police chases.
results.name: Need for Speed: Carbon

results.deck: The second game release from THQ based on Pixar's computer animated movie, Cars.
results.name: Disney/Pixar Cars: Mater-National Championship

results.deck: GUN is a third person action/adventure game setting you loose into 1800s America, where law is lost and crime runs rampant.
results.name: GUN

results.deck: Genji tells the story of Yoshitsune and Benkei, who take on the forces of the Heishi to prevent them from acquiring mysterious crystals known as the Amahagane to fulfill their evil ambition.
results.name: Genji: Dawn of the Samurai

results.deck: The first SEGA AGES 2500 is a complete remake of the original Phantasy Star on the Sega Master System.
results.name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.1: Phantasy Star - Generation:1

results.deck: Monopoly Party is a revamp of the classic board game that allows up to four players to play simultaneously. It has support for the classic turn-based play-style as well as a party mode where all players take turns at the same time.
results.name: Monopoly Party

results.deck: The Adventures of Cookie & Cream is a cooperative puzzle platformer where two rabbits must overcome obstacles in order to restore the world's moon.
results.name: The Adventures of Cookie & Cream

results.deck: MegaRace: MR3
results.name: MegaRace: MR3

results.deck: The first Ben 10 made to tie-in with the TV series.
results.name: Ben 10: Protector of Earth

results.deck: Journey back to Spira two years later to rescue the missing Tidus in this first direct sequel to a Final Fantasy title.
results.name: Final Fantasy X-2

results.deck: Based on the unpopular movie of the same name. After fire-breathing dragons awaken and nearly annihilate the human race, players take on the role of a survivor using scavenged military hardware to fight back, or become a dragon themselves and finish off the humans once and for all.
results.name: Reign of Fire

results.deck: NHL 2K6 was the first NHL game to hit next-gen consoles with a release on the Xbox360.
results.name: NHL 2K6

results.deck: Gungrave is a third-person shooter revolving around an undead man named Beyond the Grave. Wielding two custom handguns and a coffin that transforms into a variety of heavy weapons, he fights to take revenge on those who wronged him.
results.name: Gungrave

results.deck: Kaena is a Japan-only release, based on the French-Canadian CGI film "Kaena: La Prophtie"
results.name: Kaena

results.deck: In Psi-Ops: The Mindgate Conspiracy the player assumes the role of Nick Scryer, an amnesiac with latent psychic abilities. Join Nick as he seeks to uncover the motives behind "The Movement" and recover his forgotten memories.
results.name: Psi-Ops: The Mindgate Conspiracy

results.deck: Formula One 2003 was the first exclusive Formula 1 licensed game that Sony Computer Entertainment released previously sharing the license with EA.
results.name: Formula One 2003

results.deck: A game based on the cartoon that aired on Nickelodeon.
results.name: Fairly OddParents: Breakin' Da Rules

results.deck: The fourth Monkey Island game and the first to be in 3D. Escape tells the tale of Guybrush Threepwood's attempts to get Elaine reelected and defeat both LeChuck and his new ally, the evil Australian Ozzie Mandrill.
results.name: Escape from Monkey Island

results.deck: The final Syphon Filter title, Logan's Shadow is the sequel to Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror, and introduces underwater combat to the series.
results.name: Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow

results.deck: Killed in his attempt to unify Japan, Nobunaga Oda makes a pact with the demon king Fortinbras and returns to life with a vengeance. Princess Yuki of Inabayama Castle is caught in the crossfire and kidnapped... but not before sending a letter for help to her friend, the master samurai Samanosuke Akechi.
results.name: Onimusha: Warlords

results.deck: A high octane arcade driving game, remembered for its pop-punk soundtrack and product placement. The objective is to take passengers to their desired location within the time limit.
results.name: Crazy Taxi

results.deck: The Oceanic Community Union (OCU) and the United States of the New Continent (USN) fight for control of Huffman Island in this online chapter of the Front Mission series.
results.name: Front Mission Online

results.deck: Based on a true story, take control of your squad and lead your brothers in arms to victory though France and suppress the German forces.
results.name: Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30

results.deck: Fusion is the debut of the WipEout series on PlayStation 2.
results.name: WipEout Fusion

results.deck: FIFA 06 boasts anew intuitive game play engine for a fast and attacking experience.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 06

results.deck: Destroy All Humans! 2 is the sequel to the popular game in which you play an extra-terrestrial destroying human beings.
results.name: Destroy All Humans! 2

results.deck: Club Football 2005 is the most recent release of Codemaster's Club Football series and was released in 16 different versions
results.name: Club Football 2005

results.deck: This run-of-the-mill action game, released shortly before Revenge of the Sith hit theaters, putting you in the shoes of Anakin Skywalker as he battles with Count Dooku, General Grievous, and most importantly, himself.
results.name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

results.deck: In this departure from the core gameplay aspects of the traditional Yu-Gi-Oh card game, players battle on a 7x7 grid each having a designated "Deck Leader" which is the representation of their Life Points. Players then attempt to destroy the opposing "Deck Leader" with monsters from their respective decks.
results.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duelists of the Roses

results.deck: Fifa 2004 lets you "Create Brilliance" with its exclusive "Off the Ball" Control System.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 2004

results.deck: A 2D fantasy action RPG which makes use of gorgeous sprite-based artwork. Odin Sphere was developed by Vanillaware and released for the PlayStation 2 by Atlus in 2007.
results.name: Odin Sphere

results.deck: When they visit a spot where they used to play as children, the twin sisters Mio and Mayu suddenly find themselves in a village where night is eternal. With only a magic camera to defend themselves, they have to solve the village's mystery while defending themselves from evil spirits.
results.name: Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly

results.deck: Twisted Metal goes portable with Twisted Metal: Head-On for the PSP.
results.name: Twisted Metal: Head-On

results.deck: An online version of Twisted Metal: Black.
results.name: Twisted Metal: Black ONLINE

results.deck: SpongeBob and friends compete for the role of the villain in the new Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy movie.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Lights, Camera, Pants!

results.deck: A spin off of the Tony Hawk Pro Skater series and part of Activision's O2 line of extreme sports games, Kelly Slater's Pro Surfer is a surfing game in which allows players experience the thrill of riding the waves from the comfort of their living room.
results.name: Kelly Slater's Pro Surfer

results.deck: The college football season is back for the 2003 season with NCAA Football 2003 featuring Joey Harrington on the cover.
results.name: NCAA Football 2003

results.deck: An action-adventure game released only in Europe, developed by ITE Media.
results.name: Agent Hugo

results.deck: The sequel to the original Virtua Cop. It is a on rails style shooter and allows the use of peripherals, specifically the light gun.
results.name: Virtua Cop 2

results.deck: Fly through the air on a broom as Harry and friends while playing the wizarding world's favorite sport, Quidditch.
results.name: Harry Potter: Quidditch World Cup

results.deck: A strategic role-playing game that features characters from various Namco and Capcom games, such as Tekken, Soul Calibur, Ghosts 'n Goblins, and Mega Man Legends.
results.name: Namco x Capcom

results.deck: Create unique monsters by drawing, and then use them to challenge the King Of All Doodles in this take on the monster battle genre.
results.name: Magic Pengel: The Quest for Color
